original_text: People who have grown up eat proper food. In the same way, people who have been believers for a long time should understand more about God's message. They should have learned about what is good and about what is bad. They should know the difference between those.
korean_text: 단단한 음식은 장성한 자의 것이니 그들은 지각을 사용함으로 연단을 받아 선악을 분별하는 자들이니라

sentences.original_text: people who have been believers for a long time
should understand more about God's message
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 말씀에 대해 더 많이 이해해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: They should have learned about what is good
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 무엇이 선한 것인지 배워야 했습니다

sentences.original_text: They should know the difference between those
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그것들 사이의 차이를 알아야 합니다
